GapFillInput.Title: Phrasal verbs
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct preposition into each gap to make the correct phrasal verb.

Content.Question:
1. Why do we usually end up at the same restaurant?
2. I wish that Tom would stop banging on about his new job.
3. It took David a while to calm down after receiving some bad news about his job.
4. The last person out of the building always switches the light off.
5. Peter was thrown out of the night club for bad behaviour.
6. We needed time to talk over our plans for the future.
7. Why do you always put me down in front of your best friend?
8. Josie closes up when we talk about her motherâ€™s illness.
9. You come across as a very confident and outgoing person.
10. Jane has fallen out with her sister over something of little importance!
